about_the_game:
Story
The angel was cast into the prison.
One of her wings turned black, a mark of her fall from grace.
Before the wing is fully tainted, she must escape this prison.
Along the way, she encounters fallen souls and monsters, sometimes engaging in fierce battles.
But in order to fly again, she takes up her weapon and prepares for her final fight.
Will her sins ever be forgiven?

How to Play
This is a 3D action game with a moderate level of difficulty.
You can choose from three difficulty levels: EASY, NORMAL, and HARD, allowing you to play according to your style and skill.
The goal of the game is to collect "hearts," which are obtained by defeating bosses or meeting certain conditions, and make your way to the prison's exit.
Use a variety of weapons and guns to overcome enemies and obstacles. Each weapon has its unique properties, requiring strategic combat.

Controls

Move: WASD || Left Stick

Melee Attack: Left Click || RB

Pick Up / Drop Item: Q || Y

Aim: Right Click (Hold) || LB

Shoot: Aim + Left Click || RB

Reload: Aim + R || RT

Dodge: Left Control || B

Jump: Space || A

Inspect: E || X

Check Hearts: T || LT

Toggle Aim Mode: Keyboard = G || Gamepad = START

Aim: Mouse Cursor || Right Stick
This story is fictional and not related to any actual events, religions, or organizations.
• Ending: 1 type
• Estimated playtime: About 1-2 hours
• Save feature: Available

Streaming Guidelines

1. Regarding Streaming and Let’s Play Videos

• You do not need to contact us in advance to stream or create Let’s Play videos of our game.

• You are free to create content regardless of whether it is monetized or not.

2. Important Notes

• Please refrain from acts of defamation or making offensive comments about others.

• Treat the game content and other players with respect.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 (4th generation or later)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or equivalent
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 (4th generation or later)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570 or equivalent
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: A 3D action game where you control an angel striving to escape from a prison.The objective is to overcome waves of enemies using a variety of firearms and collect six hearts.Engage in combat to reclaim your freedom and take flight once again.
